Room.Name: Plasnelt Road
Room.ShortDescription: Plasnelt Road continues to the east and west.
Room.LongDescription: A very ornate gate set in a tall, stone wall partially hides a mansion on the north side of Plasnelt Road. Just inside the gate there is a pair of guards, each wearing a crimson coat and a high, fur hat. They stand stiffly, as if made of wood. A flag snaps in the breeze just above the guard station at the gate. A general store is on the south side of the road.
